name: A mixture of 5-chloro-2-methyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one (CAS Reg. No. 26172-55-4) and 2-methyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one
FoodContactSubstance: A mixture of 5-chloro-2-methyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one (CAS Reg. No. 26172-55-4) and 2-methyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one (CAS Reg. No. 2682-20-4) at a ratio of 3 parts to 1 part by weight. The mixture may contain magnesium or sodium nitrate at a 1 to 1 ratio (weight/weight) with the sum of the isothiazolinone ingredients.
